abstract: While Apple’s overhaul of Mac and iPhone software adds capabilities that already exist as apps, some developers were not troubled with the prospect of having Apple as a rival.
snippet: While Apple’s overhaul of Mac and iPhone software adds capabilities that already exist as apps, some developers were not troubled with the prospect of having Apple as a rival.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s overhaul of the software for Macs and iPhones will add dozens of new capabilities, like group messaging, reminder lists and the ability to save Web articles for later reading.

headline.main: New Apple Software Treads on Apps, but Developers Remain Untroubled
headline.print_headline: New Apple Software Treads on Apps, But Developers Remain Untroubled
